run() - Method in class view.ViewFacade
Defined frame's parameters : - map's dimension with setDimension - the game panel's position and his size with setDisplayFrame - The frame's size with setSize Search in a board for set an entity to a square for each coordinate Send the key pressed to interact thanks to keyListener when the frame has the focus setFocusable allows the frame to be focusable requestFocus give the focus on the component
